species.name: drakloak
descriptions: It’s capable of flying faster than 120 mph. It battles alongside Dreepy and dotes on them until they successfully evolve.
Without a Dreepy to place on its head and care for, it gets so uneasy it’ll try to substitute any Pokémon it finds for the missing Dreepy.

abilities.name: clear-body
abilities.effect: Prevents stats from being lowered by other Pokémon.

abilities.name: infiltrator
abilities.effect: Bypasses light screen, reflect, and safeguard.

abilities.name: cursed-body
abilities.effect: Has a 30% chance of Disabling any move that hits the Pokémon.
